Posts.EditableText: I created a new game, but when I tried to edit it, the server gave me a 404 error, saying it couldn't find the game. How do I fix this?
Posts.HTML: I created a new game, but when I tried to edit it, the server gave me a 404 error, saying it couldn't find the game. How do I fix this?

Posts.EditableText:
The server sometimes goes offline briefly. You possibly chose that time to create your game . Try again.
I just created a test game and deleted it with no problem.
Posts.HTML:
The server sometimes goes offline briefly. You possibly chose that time to create your game . Try again.
I just created a test game and deleted it with no problem.
